synopsis.text: After a seven-year hiatus, Saku Ooyagi finds himself back in his hometown, ready to start anew at S≈çei High School. On his first day, he crosses paths with Mihoshi Akeno, his lively childhood friend with a passion for astronomy. Despite their last memory together involving a near-disastrous tree-climbing incident, Mihoshi is eager to rekindle their friendship and recruits Saku into her astronomy club. As the club grows with the addition of Hime Makita, a girl with her sights set on winning Saku's heart, the group embarks on a journey of self-discovery and growth. Through the lens of their shared love for the cosmos, the members navigate the trials and triumphs of high school, each emerging with a fresh perspective on life.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
